org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagelocation

Interface MessageLocationHighlighter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageLocationConsumer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SelectableContentHttpMessageContainer, SelectableContentMessageContainer<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpPanelComponentViewsManager, HttpRequestAllPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpRequestBodyPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpRequestHeaderPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, RequestAllComponent, RequestSplitComponent, ResponseAllComponent, ResponseSplitComponent, SelectMessageLocationsPanel

    public interface MessageLocationHighlighter
extends MessageLocationConsumer
    A MessageLocationConsumer capable of highlighting locations.
    Since:
    2.4.0
    See Also:
    MessageLocationHighlight, MessageLocation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageLocationHighlight highlight(MessageLocation location)
      Highlights the given location, with an undefined highlight.
      MessageLocationHighlight highlight(MessageLocation location, MessageLocationHighlight highlight)
      Highlights the given location with the given highlight.
      void removeHighlight(MessageLocation location, MessageLocationHighlight highlightReference)
      Removes a previous highlight.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.zaproxy.zap.model.MessageLocationConsumer

        supports, supports

    • Method Detail

      • highlight

        MessageLocationHighlight highlight(MessageLocation location)
        Highlights the given location, with an undefined highlight.
        Parameters:
        location - the location that will be highlighted
        Returns:
        a reference to the highlight added, null if it's was not possible to highlight

      • highlight

        MessageLocationHighlight highlight(MessageLocation location,
                                   MessageLocationHighlight highlight)
        Highlights the given location with the given highlight.
        Parameters:
        location - the location that will be highlighted
        highlight - the highlight applied to the location
        Returns:
        a reference to the highlight added, null if it's was not possible to highlight

      • removeHighlight

        void removeHighlight(MessageLocation location,
                     MessageLocationHighlight highlightReference)
        Removes a previous highlight.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of a previous highlight
        highlightReference - a reference to a previous highlight
